textBeforeTable: John Lewis & Waitrose shops Place and pay for your order online by 8pm today (2pm for Collect+ locations), and we’ll deliver it to your chosen shop for you to collect after 2pm tomorrow (Collect+ times may vary - we'll send you a text as soon as your order's ready to collect). You'll be offered the nearest options for collection in checkout, based on your delivery postcode. How to click & collect
textAfterTable: Delivery options Price Timing Next/named working day UK delivery pre-10.30am £9.95 Monday to Friday 7.30am - 10.30am, excluding public holidays. Order by 8pm previous working day. Next Working Day UK delivery £6.95 Monday to Saturday 7.30am – 6pm, excluding public holidays. Order by 8pm previous working day (Saturday 8pm for Monday deliveries, subject to availability. Order Hampers by noon). Named Day UK delivery £6.95 Date of your choice, subject to availability. Monday to Saturday 7.30am – 6pm, excluding public holidays.
